submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        cnt = collections.Counter()
        onesum = [0] * (k + 1)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            l, r = nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]
            diff = abs(l - r)
            cnt[diff] += 1
            onehi = max(k - l, k - r, l, r)
            onesum[onehi] += 1
        for i in range(1, k + 1):
            onesum[i] += onesum[i - 1]
        
        ans = n
        for diff in cnt:
            same = cnt[diff]
            one = onesum[k] - (onesum[diff - 1] if diff >= 1 else 0) - same
            two = n // 2 - same - one
            ans = min(ans, one + two * 2)
            
        return ans
